I could not find a direct translation of the exact phrase "Amount of emission" as a label in the Lithuanian context file provided. However, based on the context of emissions and environmental terminology in Lithuanian from the files, a usual translation for "Amount of emission" would be:

"Išmetamųjų teršalų kiekis"

This phrase preserves the meaning, using commonly understood terms for "amount" (kiekis) and "emission" (išmetamieji teršalai/teršalai). [abstract]
